data.text:
PLEASE READ THE ITEM DESCRIPTION BEFORE MAKING A PURCHASE.

Peter's Friends - DVD - 1992

**MGM Limited Edition MOD (Manufactured On Demand) DVD**

Brand New and Sealed, 2014 Official USA Released DVD!

Product Details:

Actors: Kenneth Branagh, Rita Rudner, Stephen Fry, Hugh Laurie, Emma Thompson, Tony Slattery

Directors: Kenneth Branagh

Format: NTSC, Color, Stereo

Language: English

Region: All Regions

Aspect Ratio: 16:9 (widescreen)

Number of discs: 1

Rated: R

Studio: MGM Limited Edition MOD

DVD Release Date: 11/25/2014

Run Time: 101 minutes

UPC: 883904304463

Movie Synopsis:

Its been ten years since an eccentric yet devoted group of friends (including Emma Thompson, Hugh Laurie, Imelda Staunton, and Stephen Fry) graduated from college, and theyve reunited at a grand English manor in the countryside to ring in the New Year in style. But when the drinks start flowing, and their inhibitions are stripped away, it isnt long before this close- knit crew find themselves caught up in an unexpected melee of mishaps and misunderstandings that will soon test the very limits of love, sex, and friendship itself!

This product is MOD (Manufactured On Demand) by the distributor.

This product is expected to play back in DVD Video "play only" devices, and may not play in other DVD devices, including recorders and PC drives.

Please ask any questions you may have BEFORE you make a purchase, we do not accept returns because you did not read the items description or because you simply changed your mind.

PRODUCT GUARANTEE:

This item is guaranteed to be free of defects upon delivery. If you should have any issue with your purchase please contact us immediately before leaving feedback so we can have a chance to correct any problem you may have with your purchase. We work hard to make sure our customers are 100% satisfied with every purchase and maintain a high quality standard in customer service and support.

MGM Limited Edition DVD products are MOD (Manufactured On Demand) by the studio using recordable media and are fully authorized licensed products, By eliminating inventory, waste, and inefficiencies in the distribution system, on-demand manufacturing provides the added benefit of helping preserve the environment.

SHIPPING:

DOMESTIC (Within the continental United States)

"Economy Shipping" has an estimated arrival time of 4-10 business days.

"Standard Shipping" has an estimated delivery time of 3-5 business days.

Shipments to Alaska, Hawaii, and all off-shore U.S. territories and possessions, such as Puerto Rico. require a few extra days no matter which method you choose.

INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING:

Estimated delivery time: 2-6 WEEKS

Most International packages are delivered within 2-3 weeks, however how your government handles the package upon arrival into your country can determine just how long delivery takes. Should your package get held up for inspection that can slow delivery down into the 3-6 week delivery time frame, this is because of your government, not us, if your package fails to arrive within 6 weeks (very rare) please contact us back and we will file a claim with the shipper and authorize a replacement be sent out to you ASAP.

SHIPPING INFO FOR ALL:

When you make your purchase you are given an estimated time frame for delivery, most packages arrive within that time frame, if your package fails to arrive within that time frame please feel free to contact us so we can open a case with the shipping service and authorize that a replacement get sent out to you ASAP.

FEEDBACK POLICY:

Positive feedback is reserved for those who have left us positive feedback, after you recieve your order and have left positive feedback for us we will post positive feedback for you.
